title: Harvard Oriental Series
additional-note: This is a monographic series.  Before concluding a volume is in the public domain, search for book renewals for a volume under its distinctive title. We have not systematically searched individual volume titles. The first issue renewal shown here is for the first volume with an active CCE renewal record specifically mentioning the Harvard Oriental Series.  The renewal was filed under Books, and not under Periodicals.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Nat Bender for copyright research on this title.
